titles.title: Praise My Soul The King Of Heaven

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Praise my soul, the King of heaven, newline To His feet thy tribute bring; newline Ransomed, healed, restored, forgiven, newline Evermore His praises sing; newline Alleluia! Alleluia! newline Praise the everlasting King.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Praise Him, for His grace and favor, newline To our fathers in distress; newline Praise Him, still the same as ever, newline Slow to chide and swift to bless, newline Alleluia! Alleluia! newline Glorious in His faithfulness.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Frail as summer's flow'r we flourish, newline Blows the wind and it is gone; newline But while mortals rise and perish, newline God endures unchanging on. newline Alleluia! Alleluia! newline Praise the high Eternal One.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Angels in the height, adore Him, newline Ye behold Him face to face; newline Saints triumphant, bow before Him, newline Gathered in from every race. newline Alleluia! Alleluia! newline Praise with us, the God of grace.
